Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory296.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The entire area... is beginning to shake...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A moment later, you all notice that the ring you are standing on has begun to descend.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '...Looks like we made the right call.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'What exactly is "the Strip of Truth"...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We can only speculate that it is a codename from the designer of this facility.', 4: '1'}
{2: "...Looks like we're getting closer to the truth.", 3: '14'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "But... if that's the case, what could the School... possibly be up to?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "It clearly wields great power and resources, but it hasn't unveiled its purpose to the world.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'During Operation Acadia, around the outbreak of the Punishing Virus, the School had never showed up...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Perhaps because they had already deemed the surface world as "failures."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'If the School regarded itself as an Ark, then it must be operating on the premise that the rest of the world will be destroyed by some kind of "flood."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "In other words, maybe the School went into hiding underground because they believed that the surface couldn't endure the coming disaster.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '...They sure sound full of themselves.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "That may be true, but... judging from the Gray Ravens' intel, no humans have been found in the facility.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'How is that possible? What about those that were identified as missing by the operation...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '...There were at least hundreds of thousands of people. But so far, none of the footage sent by the Gray Ravens indicated any signs of life.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Are they hiding?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "They aren't stupid. They should know that there would be no use hiding if someone has infiltrated their facility.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Could it be that something happened in the facility...?', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Hassen', 3: "But we still haven't reestablished contact with Gray Raven. It means that they still haven't returned from the depths of the underground facility to an area where they can communicate.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "...Let's just wait and see. Isn't that what you told me?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '"Even if 【kuroname】 sees the darkness buried within this world, the commandant still manages to find one\'s own direction in life."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "...You're right. Let's just wait to hear from the Gray Ravens.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory304.png'}
{2: 'Archive Terminal', 3: 'School Archive — 19347/10'}
{2: 'Director', 3: "I understand what you're thinking."}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "...I'm sorry."}
{2: 'Director', 3: "No. It's my honor to help you complete your plan with my soul."}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "...At first, I thought you'd reprimand me or expose me."}
{2: 'Director', 3: 'Why would I? I think this really is... the right choice.'}
{2: 'Director', 3: "To some extent, I've also... lost all hope."}
